LAKSMANA CHETTYAR, SARASWATHY BHAVAN, BHARATHNOOR, NELLIKUNNU VILLAGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM DISTRICT 695 609. C.S.HRITHWIK-SR.P.P R2-5, R7 BY ADV. SRI.V.V.JOY THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Beam CRL.MC.NO. 8265 OF 2019 3 2020/KER/159 ORDER Dated this the 06" day of January, 2020 The petitioner is the sole accused in CC.No.696/2017 on the files of the Judicial first Class Magistrate Court, Chavakkad for having allegedly committed offence punishable under Section 420 of the IPC. The defacto complainant and aggrieved are respondents 2 to 7. They have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioner and that they do not have any grievance against him. A report has been obtained from the Investing Officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioner does not has any criminal antecedents. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings as against the petitioners in C.C.No.696/2017 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Chavakkad stands quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.PC and the accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE asm Biel poe Bok: CRL.MC.NO. 8265 OF 2019 4 2020/KER/IS9 APPENDIX EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A COPY OF THE COMPLAINT FILED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE B COPY OF THE CHARGE SHEET FILED BY THE GURUVAYUR POLICE IN C.C.696/2017 BEFORE THE JFCM COURT, CHAVAKKAD. ANNEXURE C AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE D AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE E AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE F AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 5TH RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE G AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 6TH RESPONDENT.
